code: import axios from"axios";import{API,API_KEY}from"../tools/keys";export var apiGetRequest=function apiGetRequest(route,page){return new Promise(function(resolve){var api="".concat(API,"/").concat(route,"?api_key=").concat(API_KEY,"&language=en-US&").concat(page?"page=".concat(page):'');try{axios.get(api).then(function(res){resolve(res.data);});}catch(error){resolve(false);}});};
